review: I have no idea why anyone would ever buy anything other than Amazon Fire TV! Previous to purchasing the Fire TV, I used a Sony blu-ray player with wi-fi and apps like Netflix and AmazonPrime, but it was slow and frequently stopped working. I have not had a single problem with Amazon Fire TV. It is exceptionally fast and the microphone works fantastically well! Worth much more than it's priced!
